an4.37:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo parihānāya nibbānasseva santike.
an4.37:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti, indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, bhojane mattaññū hoti, jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hoti.
an4.37:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an4.37:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti.
an4.37:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti?
an4.37:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an4.37:6.3: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati;
an4.37:6.6: Sotena saddaṃ sutvā … ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā … jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā … kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā … manasā dhammaṃ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an4.37:6.7: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati;
an4.37:6.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti.
an4.37:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti?
an4.37:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti:
an4.37:7.3: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya;
an4.37:7.4: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya.
an4.37:7.5: Iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati, anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an4.37:7.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti.
an4.37:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hoti?
an4.37:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti;
an4.37:8.3: rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti;
an4.37:8.4: rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti, pāde pādaṃ accādhāya, sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā;
an4.37:8.5: rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti.
an4.37:8.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hoti.
an4.37:8.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo parihānāya, nibbānasseva santiketi.
an4.37:11.1: * Appamādarato bhikkhu,
an4.37:11.2: pamāde bhayadassi vā;
